LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.1.letterText: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha cometido un error fatal mientras operaba a {PATIENT_labelShort} debido a los desafíos especiales que supone: {RECIPE_label}.
LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.2.letterText: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha fallado catastróficamente mientras operaba a {PATIENT_labelShort} ({RECIPE_label}).
LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.3.letterText: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha fallado ridículamente mientras operaba a {PATIENT_labelShort} ({RECIPE_label}).
LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.4.letterLabe: La cirugía fracasó en {PATIENT_labelShort}: Esterilizad{PATIENT_gender ? o : a}
